question: What are the names of disaster projects advertised before 2023
raw_answer: Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Latigo Canyon Road Culvert Repairs, Coral Canyon Culvert Repairs.
evidence_answer: Corral Canyon Culvert Repairs, Latigo Canyon Road Culvert Repairs, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Clover Heights Storm Drain
